    Fantasy Football Data

    fantasy-football.Rmd
    library(fflr)
packageVersion("fflr")
#> [1] '1.9.1'
ffl_id(leagueId = "42654852")
#> Temporarily set `fflr.leagueId` option to 42654852
#> [1] "42654852"

    This vignette will demonstrate the fflr functions used to reach equivalency with the ESPN fantasy football website. The website has eight section headers with various subsections:

    1. My Team
      • Overview
      • Stats (TBD)
      • Schedule (TBD)
      • News
      • Projections (TBD)
      • Ranks (TBD)
    2. League
      • League Home
      • Settings
      • Members
      • Rosters
      • Schedule
      • Message Board
      • Transaction Counter
      • History
      • Draft Recap
      • Email League
      • Recent Activity
    3. Players
      • Add Players
      • Watch List
      • Scoring Leaders
      • Live Draft Trends
      • Points Against
      • Added / Dropped
      • Player News
      • Projections
      • Budget Summary
      • Offers Report
      • Stat Corrections
    4. FantasyCast
    5. Scoreboard
    6. Standings
    7. Opposing Teams
    8. LM Tools
      • League Membership Tools
      • Draft Tools
      • League and Scoring Settings Tools
      • Roster Tools
      • Schedule and Standings Tools
      • Miscellaneous Tools

    My Team

    The My Team page presents an overview of, well, your fantasy team. From this page, a team manager can set their lineup and see statistics and news on the players on their roster.

    There are six subsections on the My Team page.

    Overview

    The team_roster() function returns all rosters in a league. The output of this function is organized to replicate the layout of the table found on the website. Players are listed in order of their “slot” with name and team information followed by projected and actual scores and ownership statistics.

    my_team <- team_roster(scoringPeriodId = 1)[[1]] # select first roster
my_team[, -(1:3)]
#> # A tibble: 16 × 12
#>    lineupSlot      id firstName  lastName    proTeam position injuryStatus
#>    <fct>        <int> <chr>      <chr>       <fct>   <fct>    <chr>       
#>  1 QB         3139477 Patrick    Mahomes     KC      QB       A           
#>  2 RB         3117251 Christian  McCaffrey   Car     RB       A           
#>  3 RB         4242335 Jonathan   Taylor      Ind     RB       A           
#>  4 WR           16800 Davante    Adams       GB      WR       A           
#>  5 WR         3925357 Calvin     Ridley      Atl     WR       A           
#>  6 TE         3116365 Mark       Andrews     Bal     TE       A           
#>  7 FX         4360294 Antonio    Gibson      Wsh     RB       A           
#>  8 DS          -16027 Buccaneers D/ST        TB      DS       A           
#>  9 PK         2473037 Jason      Myers       Sea     PK       A           
#> 10 BE         4259545 D'Andre    Swift       Det     RB       Q           
#> 11 BE         4045163 Miles      Sanders     Phi     RB       A           
#> 12 BE         3919596 Chris      Carson      Sea     RB       A           
#> 13 BE           16799 Allen      Robinson II Chi     WR       A           
#> 14 BE           16460 Adam       Thielen     Min     WR       A           
#> 15 BE         3932905 Diontae    Johnson     Pit     WR       A           
#> 16 BE         3128429 Courtland  Sutton      Den     WR       A           
#> # … with 5 more variables: projectedScore <dbl>, actualScore <dbl>,
#> #   percentStarted <dbl>, percentOwned <dbl>, percentChange <dbl>

    News

    The player_outlook() and player_news() functions return news on your roster. The first returns all outlooks by player and week and cannot be refined beyond setting a limit of players to return (in order of rank).

    player_outlook(limit = 1)
#> # A tibble: 3 × 6
#>   seasonId scoringPeriodId      id firstName lastName  outlook                  
#>      <int>           <int>   <int> <chr>     <chr>     <chr>                    
#> 1     2021               0 3117251 Christian McCaffrey McCaffrey was limited to…
#> 2     2021               1 3117251 Christian McCaffrey McCaffrey produced at a …
#> 3     2021               2 3117251 Christian McCaffrey McCaffrey rushed for 98 …

    The second fiction takes a single playerId value and returns all the recent news on that player, including premium stories in HTML format.

    player_news(playerId = "3139477", parseHTML = FALSE)
#> # A tibble: 11 × 6
#>         id published           type     premium headline          body          
#>      <int> <dttm>              <chr>    <lgl>   <chr>             <chr>         
#>  1 3139477 2021-09-17 23:13:41 Story    FALSE   NFL Week 2 game … "<p><video1><…
#>  2 3139477 2021-09-13 03:01:33 Rotowire FALSE   Mahomes complete… "The 25-year-…
#>  3 3139477 2021-09-10 14:36:05 Story    TRUE    NFL Week 1 predi… "<p><video1><…
#>  4 3139477 2021-09-08 04:56:27 Story    FALSE   'So, you're Patr… "<p><video1><…
#>  5 3139477 2021-08-31 14:15:41 Story    TRUE    Predicting NFL t… "<p><video1><…
#>  6 3139477 2021-08-28 03:31:05 Rotowire FALSE   Mahomes complete… "Mahomes was …
#>  7 3139477 2021-08-21 03:07:20 Rotowire FALSE   Mahomes complete… "There had be…
#>  8 3139477 2021-08-18 16:33:13 Rotowire FALSE   Coach Andy Reid … "Mahomes play…
#>  9 3139477 2021-08-15 04:19:01 Rotowire FALSE   Mahomes complete… "Mahomes conn…

#> 11 3139477 2021-07-23 18:55:35 Rotowire FALSE   Mahomes doesn't … "This was exp…

    League

    ESPN fantasy leagues have their own unique settings and structure. This package has been tested for a very narrow subset of those possible settings.

    league_info(leagueId = "42654852")
#> # A tibble: 1 × 6
#>         id seasonId name             isPublic  size finalScoringPeriod
#>      <int>    <int> <chr>            <lgl>    <int>              <int>
#> 1 42654852     2021 FFLR Test League TRUE         4                 17
league_name()
#> [1] "FFLR Test League"
league_size()
#> # A tibble: 1 × 2
#>   seasonId  size
#>      <int> <int>
#> 1     2021     4
str(league_status())
#> tibble [1 × 12] (S3: tbl_df/tbl/data.frame)
#>  $ year                   : int 2021
#>  $ isActive               : logi TRUE
#>  $ activatedDate          : POSIXct[1:1], format: "2021-08-03 14:40:01"
#>  $ scoringPeriodId        : int 2
#>  $ firstScoringPeriod     : int 1
#>  $ finalScoringPeriod     : int 17
#>  $ previousSeasons        :List of 1
#>   ..$ : list()
#>  $ standingsUpdateDate    : POSIXct[1:1], format: "2021-09-18 19:48:16"
#>  $ teamsJoined            : int 4
#>  $ waiverLastExecutionDate: POSIXct[1:1], format: "2021-09-18 07:11:13"
#>  $ waiverNextExecutionDate: POSIXct[1:1], format: NA
#>  $ waiverProcessStatus    :List of 1
#>   ..$ :'data.frame': 0 obs. of  1 variable:
#>   .. ..$ date: 'POSIXct' num(0) 
#>  - attr(*, "tzone")= chr ""
